segments.text: Could you please help me to check out the book ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , what's the author's name , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't remember that clearly . It probably be Charles ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , no , no . I'm not interested in literature .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , do you know the title of the book ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , sorry . I'm always absent-minded . I remember that I've put a note in my pocket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , show me the note please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , such bad luck , sir . Can you please name the category of the book ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . It's not fiction . It's biography .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I'll search it for you . A moment , please .
segments.speaker: S2
